segments.text: I notice two children on the other side of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is attempting to reach a cookie jar in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, one hand already in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the stool's legs are splayed makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, clearly expecting her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised at their brazenness, right there in the open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't anyone else see how precarious this whole situation is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could cause a real injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance and crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their prize, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
